amendment.description: To increase student financial aid by an amount that matches the increase in low- and middle-income family college costs.

action.text: Amendment SA 1566 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1566 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 331.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1566.

Amendment SA 1566 proposed by Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11069-11077, S11086; text: CR S11069) To increase student financial aid by an amount that matches the increase in low- and middle-income family college costs.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1566 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 331.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1566 proposed by Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 1542.
